arts.ttl: Al-Nassr bid €65m for Brighton star Kaoru Mitoma
arts.sum: The Athletic's football correspondent David Ornstein has exclusively revealed on X that Saudi Pro League side Al-Nassr, the team that Cristiano Ronaldo plays for, have attempted to raid Brighton. Saudi Pro League side Al-Nassr have launched a shock transfer bid for Brighton and Hove Albion's wing wizard.

arts.ttl: Jhon Durán set for Al Nassr move - second most expensive signing ever by a Saudi Arabian club
arts.sum: Aston Villa striker Jhon Durán is reportedly set to complete a sensational move to Saudi Arabia before the end of the January transfer window. According to multiple reports, the...

arts.ttl: Leverkusen say Boniface will stay amid Saudi bid
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen coach Xabi Alonso said Wednesday that Nigerian striker Victor Boniface is set to stay at the club following reports of a possible transfer to Saudi Arabia.

arts.ttl: Al-Nassr agree deal to sign Aston Villa star Jhon Duran
arts.sum: Al-Nassr agree deal to sign Aston Villa star Jhon Duran - Ornstein Villa significantly softened their stance and have now agreed to sell Duran to Saudi Arabia for a guaranteed fee worth €77 million plus potential add-ons, according to David Ornstein of The Athletic .

arts.ttl: Aston Villa 'on the verge' of transfer agreement amid mega bids for Jhon Duran and Ollie Watkins
arts.sum: Al-Nassr are reportedly on the verge of reaching a verbal agreement with Aston Villa over signing Jhon Duran. Then, after assisting Jacob Ramsey in the draw with West Ham last weekend, Watkins reached 100 goal involvements in the fewest Premier League games (169) by any player since Kevin De Bruyne achieved the milestone in 155 matches in July 2020.

arts.ttl: Confusion over Boniface's proposed Al Nassr move
arts.sum: Victor Boniface's move from Bayer Leverkusen to Al Nassr has apparently not been finalized in writing.

arts.ttl: Preview: Al Raed vs. Al-Nassr - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Thursday's Saudi Pro League clash between Al Raed and Al-Nassr, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Al-Nassr reach agreement to sign Victor Boniface
arts.sum: Al-Nassr have reached an agreement worth around €60m to sign Bayer Leverkusen forward Victor Boniface (24), according to Sky Germany. The Nigerian becomes the club’s second most expensive departure in…
